file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 26-25-01-06 - AUTODISCHARGE FIRE EXTINGUISHER BOTTLE - INSPECTION/CHECK

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL AUTODISCHARGE FIRE EXTINGUISHER BOTTLE - INSPECTION/CHECK EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to do the inspection of the waste auto-fire-extinguisher bottle. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY TOILET-WASTE AUTO-FIRE-EXTIN- ALL 26-25-01-200-801-A GUISHER BOTTLE - INSPECTION TOILET-WASTE AUTO-FIRE-EXTIN- ALL 26-25-01-200-802-A ♦ GUISHER BOTTLE - INSPECTION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 26-25-01 Page 1 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 26-25-01-200-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. TOILET-WASTE AUTO-FIRE-EXTINGUISHER BOTTLE - INSPECTION A. General (1) This task permits you to do a check on the general condition of the toilet-waste auto-fire- extinguisher bottle. B. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable C. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable D. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable E. Consumable Materials Not Applicable F. Expandable Parts Not Applicable G. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Aircraft toilet H. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) Remove the toilet waste to get access to the discharge pipings of the auto-fire- extinguisher bottle. (2) Open the lower compartment door to get access to the auto-fire-extinguisher bottle. I. Visually Check Lavatory Fire Extinguisher Bottle Pressure (Figure 601) SUBTASK 211-002-A (1) Do a visual inspection on the toilet-waste auto-fire-extinguisher bottle for general condition and on the seals of the discharge pipings for integrity. (2) Examine the pressure gauge of the fire extinguishing bottle for correct indication. J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Install the toilet waste. (2) Close the lower compartment door. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-801-A/600 26-25-01 Page 2 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: ALL Toilet-Waste Auto-Fire-Extinguisher Bottle - Component Locations Figure 601 A ZONE 261 FIRE EXTINGUISHER DOOR DISCHARGE PIPINGS SEALS DISCHARGE PIPINGS WASTE CONTAINER DOOR FIRE EXTINGHISHER BOTTLE DET. A 145AMM260014.MCE C EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-801-A/600 26-25-01 Page 3 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 26-25-01-200-802-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 3. TOILET-WASTE AUTO-FIRE-EXTINGUISHER BOTTLE - INSPECTION A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to do the check of the weight of the toilet-waste auto-fire- extinguisher bottle. (2) To do the inspection, it is necessary to remove the toilet-waste auto-fire-extinguisher bottle from the aircraft. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 26-25-01-000-801-A/400 AUTODISCHARGE FIRE EXTINGUISHER - REMOVAL AUTODISCHARGE FIRE EXTINGUISHER - INSTAL- AMM TASK 26-25-01-400-801-A/400 LATION CMM ATA 26-25-12 - C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Toilet I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-003-A (1) Remove the toilet-waste auto-fire-extinguisher bottle ( AMM TASK 26-25-01-000-801- A/400). J. Toilet-Waste Auto-Fire-Extinguisher Bottle - Weight Inspection SUBTASK 280-002-A (1) Weigh the toilet-waste auto-fire-extinguisher bottle. Refer to the last revision of CMM ATA 26-25-12. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-802-A/600 26-25-01 Page 4 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL K. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-003-A (1) Install the toilet-waste auto-fire-extinguisher bottle ( AMM TASK 26-25-01-400-801-A/ 400).
